thread.title: Samsung S8+ is a whopper of a phone
thread.title_full: Samsung S8+ is a whopper of a phone

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Samsung S8+ is a whopper of a phone
text:
Samsung S8+ is a whopper of a phone A super-sized Samsung S8 for those who need more than just an Edge 24 February 2017 / 13:02SGT 
VentureBeat's Evan Blass just Tweeted specs for the super-large Galaxy S8+ and it's huge. 6.2in of screen space 
If the specs leaked are to be believed, the phone will have a massive 6.2in screen, with the usual Super AMOLED panel. The base Galaxy S8 will also have a Super AMOLED panel, and it's unclear as to how much different the smaller phone will be from the bigger one. 
It's obvious it will be a flagship level phone, what with its 4GB of RAM, 64GB of storage and Qualcomm's Snapdragon 835 processor as well as an iris scanner, water-resistance, wireless charging and AKG-tuned earphones. A microSD card slot will also be included, and it's likely Samsung's AI assistant Bixby will be featured as well. 
Pricing is as yet uncertain but word is the phones will be finally unveiled mid-March with availability slated for sometime in April. 
Here's a roundup of everything that's come out so far about the upcoming Samsung flagships.
